noun.description: A short, sharp sound as of a switch being operated or of two hard objects coming quickly into contact.
examples: she heard the click of the door

verb.description: Make or cause to make a short, sharp sound as of a switch being operated or of two hard objects coming smartly into contact.
examples: the key clicked in the lock and the door opened
finally it clicked what all the fuss had been about

phrases: A male voice roared, followed by the sound of a pistol's barrel clicking into place.
Once you have a nice even spread of paste, proceed by placing the copper cooler into position and pushing down the two pins until you hear them click into place.
The seventh hour of the clock on the wall clicked into place.
It clicks into place in an upright position when needed.
She gasped once and passed out when the bones clicked into place.
